author: Mark Hilliard
title: Chemicals sourced to allow 10,000 Covid-19 tests a day, says national lab
description: Dublin-based NVRL reaches agreement with Genomics Medicine Ireland
content:
The National Virus Reference Laboratory (NVRL) has sourced a new supply of chemicals that will enable it increase coronavirus testing to as many as 10,000 per day in the coming weeks. 
The Dublin-based lab has reached agreement with Genomics Medicine Ireland… [+2639 chars]
